name: prprompts-flutter-generator
description: AI-powered Flutter development with full automation - Generate 32 security-audited guides & auto-implement in 2-3 hours (40-60x faster)
author: Kandil7

scripts.test: npm run test:validation && npm run test:commands
scripts.test:quick: echo "✅ Quick validation: Checking prompt files..." && ls .claude/prompts/*.md | wc -l
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:local-install && npm run test:examples
scripts.test:local-install: npm install -g . && prprompts --version && echo "✅ Local installation successful"
scripts.test:examples: bash -c 'mkdir -p test-output && cd test-output && cp ../examples/healthcare-prd.md . && echo "✅ Example tests passed"'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:markdown && npm run lint:shell
scripts.lint:markdown: markdownlint '**/*.md' --ignore node_modules --config .markdownlint.json || echo "⚠️  Markdown linting found issues (non-blocking)"
scripts.lint:shell: shellcheck scripts/*.sh || echo "⚠️  Shell linting found issues (non-blocking)"
scripts.validate: npm run validate:package && npm run validate:extensions
scripts.validate:extensions: bash -c 'for file in *-extension.json; do echo "Validating $file..."; node -e "JSON.parse(require(\"fs\").readFileSync(\"$file\", \"utf8\"))" || exit 1; done && echo "✅ All extensions valid"'
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test:all && npm run validate:package
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules test-output coverage *.tgz && echo "✅ Cleaned build artifacts"
scripts.doctor: npm run check-updates && npm run validate && npm test && echo "✅ Health check passed"
scripts.dev: npm install -g . && echo "✅ Development build installed"
